metrics_conclusion: Opera 2 has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Opera 2 is written in the key of F Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 8th most popular key among Minor keys and     the 19th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (F minor, Bâ™­ minor, and C minor).
